mapper.sql: BIZ_DTL_CD, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, WD_SNO, STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, RQST_DCD, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK,STND_ASRT
mapper.delete:
DELETE A /* WaqStwdCnfgMapper.deleteWAM */ FROM WAM_STWD_CNFG A INNER JOIN WAQ_DMN B
ON A.OBJ_ID = B.DMN_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

DELETE A /* WaqStwdCnfgMapper.deleteWAMItem */ FROM WAM_STWD_CNFG A INNER JOIN WAQ_SDITM B
ON A.OBJ_ID = B.SDITM_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.APRV_USER_ID != '자동생성'
mapper.insert: insert /* WaqStwdCnfgMapper.insert */ into WAQ_STWD_CNFG (BIZ_DTL_CD, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, WD_SNO, STWD_ID, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, RQST_DCD, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK) values (#{bizDtlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wdSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert /* WaqStwdCnfgMapper.insertSelective */ into WAQ_STWD_CNFG
BIZ_DTL_CD,
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
WD_SNO,
STWD_ID,
STWD_LNM,
STWD_PNM,
RQST_DCD,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
STND_ASRT,
